TextView.android:text:
1.momentum formula,p=mv 2.cyclic quadrilateral formula:
√(s−a) (s−b) (s−c) (s−d) 3.Ohms law formula
V=IR 4. Distance Of Lightning formula d = s * t 5.Velocity Formula: V=S/t 6.Optics Formula, 1/f=1/v+ 1/u 7.Work Formula, W=F.d.cos θ 8.Moment Formula= F x d 9.Amplitude Formula, Asin(wt+theta) 10. Mass Energy Formula,E=m.c^2 11.Angular Momentum Formula, L=Iw 12.Air Resistance Formula,F=-c.v^2 13.Wavelength Formula, lemda=v/f 14.Impulse Formula ,j=f.t 15.Mass = ρ × v 16.Heat Gain Formula,q = 1.10 × cfm × (to – ti) 17.Surface Charge Density Formula,σ = q / A 18.Conservation Of Energy Formula, E(in)-E(out)=E(sys) 19.Beat Frequency Formula, F(b)=F(1)-F(2) 20.Horsepower (HP) = (Torque × Speed)/5252 21.Kinematics Formulas,v=vo+at 22.Critical velocity (Vc) = K η / ρ r 23.Strain Energy Formula,U = Fδ / 2 24.Average Force Formula,F = m (vf – vi)/Δ t 25.Work Done By Gravity Formula,Wg = -mg(∆ h) 26.Normal Force Formula, FN = mg 27.Photon Energy Formula ,E=hc/lemda 28.Efficiency Formula=(work output/work input)*100% 29.Refractive Index Formula, sini/sinr=n 30.Equivalent Resistance Formula, R=R1+R2+R3+...Rn
